page.title: 02TRENTHAMS
page.content: G.Percy Trentham's Ltd. is a building and civil engineering firm which has had its H.Q. in Purley,near Reading since 1961.It is a family firm which became a limited company in 1913.The Purley H.Q. is built on the site of the old South Berks hunt.Some of the original buildings,such as the barn and stables,have been retained by Trentham's. Trentham's regional offices are situated at Stoke-on-Trent, Rainham, Cardiff,Broxburn(Scotland), and there is a London office.The company has been responsible for schemes as varied as the construction of a control tower at Gatwick Airport, and the building of a completely new brickworks in the Midlands.The Purley H.Q. employ 140 people, and the firm has an annual turn over of approximately Â£60,000,000
